verses.verse: And an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up from <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> to <S%H1066>Bochim,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I made you to <S%H5927>go<s%> up out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and have <S%H935>brought<s%> you to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and I <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H6565>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you.

And you shall <S%H3772>make<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1285>league<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> you shall <S%H5422>throw<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> their <S%H4196>altars:<s%> but you have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice:<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> have you <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2063>this?<s%>

Why I <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I will not <S%H1644>drive<s%> them out from <S%H6440>before<s%> you; but they shall be as thorns in your <S%H6654>sides,<s%> and their <S%H430>gods<s%> shall be a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to you.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>
And they <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1066>Bochim:<s%> and they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> that <S%H748>outlived<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that he <S%H6213>did<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%>the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> being an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old.<s%>

And they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in <S%H8556>Timnathheres,<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> side of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H1608>Gaash.<s%>

And <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H1755>generation<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers:<s%> and there <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> <S%H1571>yet<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1168>Baalim:<s%>

And they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> which <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3212>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H5439>round<s%> about them, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> themselves to them, and provoked the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>
And they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1168>Baal<s%> and <S%H6252>Ashtaroth.<s%>

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>hot<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H8154>spoilers<s%> that <S%H8155>spoiled<s%> them, and he <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, so that they <S%H3201>could<s%> not any <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

<S%H3605>Wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H3318>went<s%> out, the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was against them for <S%H7451>evil,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said,<s%> and as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to them: and they were <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3334>distressed.<s%>
Nevertheless the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6965>raised<s%> up <S%H8199>judges,<s%> which <S%H3467>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those that <S%H8154>spoiled<s%> them.

And <S%H1571>yet<s%> they would not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to their <S%H8199>judges,<s%> but they went a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> themselves to them: they <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> in, <S%H8085>obeying<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> but they <S%H6213>did<s%> not <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6965>raised<s%> them up <S%H8199>judges,<s%> then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was with the <S%H8199>judge,<s%> and <S%H3467>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8199>judge:<s%> for it <S%H5162>repented<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of their <S%H5009>groanings<s%> by reason of them that <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> them and <S%H1766>vexed<s%> them.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H8199>judge<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> that they <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> themselves more than their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> in <S%H3212>following<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, and to <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to them; they <S%H5307>ceased<s%> not from their own <S%H4611>doings,<s%> nor from their <S%H7186>stubborn<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%>

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>hot<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> that <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1471>people<s%> has <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice;<s%>

I <S%H1571>also<s%> will not from now <S%H3254>on<s%> <S%H3423>drive<s%> out any from <S%H6440>before<s%> them of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> when he <S%H4191>died:<s%>

That through them I may <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whether they will <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> therein, as their <S%H1>fathers<s%> did <S%H8104>keep<s%> it, or not.

Therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5117>left<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H1115>without<s%> <S%H3423>driving<s%> them out <S%H4118>hastily;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> he them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>
